entries.level_1: Know the Minor Illusion cantrip; always have Speak with Animals prepared; cast it without a slot a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus per long rest or using spell slots.

Know the Mending and Prestidigitation cantrips; spend 10 minutes casting Prestidigitation to create a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 HP) with one Prestidigitation effect; activate with a Bonus Action touch; keep up to three devices; each lasts 8 hours or until dismantled with a touch as a Utilize action.
